import React from "react"; import "./Content.css"; import { Link } from "react-router-dom"; const Content = () => { function updateClock() { let now = new Date(); let hours = now.getUTCHours().toString().padStart(2, '0'); let minutes = now.getUTCMinutes().toString().padStart(2, '0'); let seconds = now.getUTCSeconds().toString().padStart(2, '0'); document.getElementById('clock').innerHTML = `${hours}:${minutes}:${seconds}`; } setInterval(updateClock, 1000); updateClock(); return (
